Description: In Argentina it will be prohibited to export certain cuts of meat for two years. Description: Russia will temporarily ban cereal and sugar exports due to international sanctions and to protect the internal market, after the signing of the decrees on Monday by Prime Minister Mikhail Mishustin. Description: In 2021, due to lack of precipitation and hot summer, an abnormal drought occurred in Kazakhstan, which led to a shortage of fodder and a massive loss of livestock in all regions of the country. In order to prevent further deterioration of the situation, preserve the life and health of farm animals, as well as prevent a critical shortage in the domestic feed market, the temporary ban was introduced on the export of feed for farm animals

Temporary ban on the export of live cattle and small cattle was introduced in order to increase the number of livestock, considering there were both the loss of livestock in 2021 caused by the abnormal drought and increased prices for meat in the domestic market

Temporary ban on the export of potatoes  was introduced due to the abnormal drought in 2021, which led to a decrease in the yield of potatoes in the country and to an increase in its prices (potato is  considered a socially significant commodity for the country's economy), as well as due to short supplies of potatoes in neighboring countries insufficient to prevent a critical shortage in Kazakshtan, and in order to stabilize prices in Kazakhstan

Temporary ban on the export of potatoes and carrots was introduced due to the abnormal drought in 2021, which led to a decrease in the yield of potatoes and carrots in the country and to an increase in prices for these goods (which are considered socially significant commodities for the country's economy), as well as due to short supplies of potatoes and carrots in neighboring countries insufficient to prevent a critical shortage in Kazakhstan, and in order to stabilize prices in Kazakhstan
